Header.title: Sony PlayStation
Header.paragraph: Learn about the console advances from PS 1 through the current version, PS 5.

About.paragraph: PlayStation was the brainchild of Ken Kutaragi - a Sony executive who managed one of the company's hardware engineering divisions and was later dubbed "The Father of the PlayStation."
